>
[Death Knell Powder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=827)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 66

**Price** 625 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This poison is made from toxic spores of death knell mushrooms, which are reduced to a gray powder and suffused with necromantic energy. If you're reduced to 0 Hit Points while under the effect of _death knell powder_, you must succeed at a DC 34 Will save or die (this is a [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effect). If you die, a random creature adjacent to you is bolstered by your departing life force and gains 20 temporary HP and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 10 minutes.

 **Saving Throw** DC 34 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 7d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 9d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 12d6 poison damage (1 round)

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of [_death knell_](/Spells.aspx?ID=63).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
